characters.name: Maggey Byrde
characters.description1: My client. The only thing I can recall is that she's a policewoman.

characters.name: Dustin Prince
characters.description1: The victim, and a policeman. It seems that he was dating the defendant, Maggey Byrde.

characters.name: Winston Payne
characters.description1: The prosecutor for this case. Lacks presence. Generally bad at getting his points across.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Maya → Maya Fey
characters.description1: I don't remember who she is, but I get the feeling I know her...
characters.description2: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.

characters.name: Richard Wellington
characters.description1: A self-proclaimed "Drifting Virtuoso" who is still looking for the "right" college.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
characters.description2: The defendant, and my client. Was arrested on suspicion of murder while channeling.

characters.name: Dr. Turner Grey
characters.description1: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
characters.description2: Grey Surgical Clinic Director. Had a malpractice incident. Murdered during a channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
characters.description2: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Morgan Fey
characters.description1: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
characters.description2: Maya's aunt. A member of the Fey clan branch family. She is the mother of Pearl.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Ini Miney
characters.description1: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
characters.description2: College student. Researching parapsychology. Older sister, Mimi, died in a car accident.

characters.name: Mimi Miney
characters.description1: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.

characters.name: Ami Fey
characters.description1: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.

characters.name: Director Hotti (purported)
characters.description1: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Max
characters.description1: A "fabulous" magician famed for his aerial illusions. Accused of murder.

characters.name: Regina Berry
characters.description1: The idol of the Berry Big Circus and daughter to Russel Berry, the Ringmaster.

characters.name: Russell Berry
characters.description1: The victim and Ringmaster of the Berry Big Circus. Regina Berry's father.

characters.name: Ben
characters.description1: Real Name: Benjamin Woodman. A ventriloquist. Conversing with him is really tiring.
characters.description2: Real Name: Benjamin Woodman. Without his puppet Trilo, Ben won't say much.

characters.name: Moe
characters.description1: Real Name: Lawrence Curls. The Ringmaster's old friend, a pleasant stooge of a clown.

characters.name: Acro
characters.description1: Real Name: Ken Dingling. A star acrobat currently undergoing rehabilitation.
characters.description2: Real Name: Ken Dingling. Seriously injured both legs while training six months ago.

characters.name: Bat
characters.description1: Real Name: Sean Dingling. Bit on the head six months ago by Léon. Still in a coma.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.
